root.name: Q*Bert 3
root.description: OverviewQ*Bert 3 is the second sequel to the 1982 Arcade game Q*Bert (with 1983's Q*Bert's Qubes being the first sequel) and was developed and released exclusively for the Super Nintendo in October 1992. The game expands the world of Q*Bert to include themed worlds, additional enemies, various new props and obstacles and a 16-bit graphical upgrade.The gameplay remains identical: in order to progress from one stage to the next, Q*Bert has to hop onto every cube to change its color while avoiding foes attempting to impede him.
